sentences.en: A patient will usually listen to the doctor's advice and act on it.
sentences.cn: 患者通常都会遵照医嘱行事。

sentences.en: Columns are usually intended in architecture to add grandeur and status.
sentences.cn: 圆柱在建筑中通常用来增添气势和显示地位。

sentences.en: He held firm opinions which usually conflicted with my own.
sentences.cn: 他对自己的观点坚定不移，而这些观点通常和我的相左。

sentences.en: He usually moseys into town for no special reason.
sentences.cn: 他常无所事事地溜达到城里。

sentences.en: I picked first all the people who usually were left till last.
sentences.cn: 我先挑出了所有通常留到最后的人。

sentences.en: I usually buy sliced bread — it's less bother.
sentences.cn: 我通常都买切片面包——比较省事。

sentences.en: People usually complain about having to deal with too much bureaucracy.
sentences.cn: 人们经常抱怨不得不应付太多的繁文缛节。

sentences.en: That's not the kind of talk one usually hears from accountants.
sentences.cn: 会计们通常不会说那样的话.

sentences.en: The brothers usually roll into their studio around midday.
sentences.cn: 兄弟几个总是要到正午前后才姗姗来到工作室。

sentences.en: The default is usually the setting that most users would probably choose.
sentences.cn: 默认选项通常是大多数用户都会选择的设置。

sentences.en: The drive usually takes 15 or 20 minutes.
sentences.cn: 这段车程通常需要 15 或 20 分钟。

sentences.en: The menu changes weekly and usually includes a vegan option.
sentences.cn: 菜单每周都有变化，通常包含可供严格的素食者选择的菜肴。

sentences.en: There is usually room to accommodate up to 80 visitors.
sentences.cn: 那里通常可以住得下80位来客。

sentences.en: They ate, as they usually did, in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 像平常一样，他们是在厨房吃的饭。

sentences.en: Usually I wear black, grey, or brown.
sentences.cn: 通常我都穿黑色、灰色或者棕色的衣服。

sentences.en: We usually think of a victim of mugging as being someone elderly.
sentences.cn: 我们通常以为被拦路抢劫的受害者是老年人。

sentences.en: We're usually working side by side with the men.
sentences.cn: 通常我们和男性一起并肩工作。

sentences.en: Women usually live longer than men.

words.tran_cn: 习惯地,经常地,常规地,长期地

trans.tran_cn: 通常，经常，平常，惯常地，一直，向来，动不动，一般，素
trans.tran_en: used to talk about what happens on most occasions or in most situations
used to talk about what happens on most occasions or in most situations
